Class DirPheromone

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.Item<PheromoneRep>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClockListener, Representable<PheromoneRep>, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class DirPheromone
extends Pheromone
    A class for pheromones with a direction.

      • DirPheromone

        public DirPheromone​(Environment environ,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int time,
                    CellPerception target)
        Initializes a new DirPheromone instance with a specified lifetime.
        Parameters:
        environ - the environment the new DirPheromone is situated in
        x - x-coordinate of the new DirPheromone
        y - y-coordinate of the new DirPheromone
        time - the initial strength of the new DirPheromone
        target - the area this DirPheromone points at

        y - y-coordinate of the Pheromone
